Name: Wok on Fire
Review Text:
Not an expert on Thai food, but this was super tasty! Service is super kind.
Will be back :)

Name: Wok on Fire
Review Text: I ordered the chicken pad Thai here once every week. This time I ordered two chicken pad Thais and they were both very dry. The noodles and the chicken were very dry. I called to tell them this happened and the guy just said ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt cook ‚Ä¶

Name: Wok on Fire
Review Text: Our absolute favorite!!! Having lived in Asia we were missing some really good Thai Food and thank god we found this place! Best Thai Food around! ‚Ä¶

Name: Wok on Fire
Review Text: Have ordered food 4 times now since april. It is realy good and brings back the taste of Thai food of the holiday. Like having dinner in Thailand! The new owner realy gave it a quality boost. For me Best Thai food in Amsterdam!

Name: Wok on Fire
Review Text: Although food is not bad, it took a long time before food got delivered (the delivery guy went to the wrong place to deliver and had me walking towards him! He didn‚Äôt bother to read the instructions on the order)

Name: Wok on Fire
Review Text: Hot and fresh, I had the pad Thai and it was delicious. The guys were cooking up a storm and there is some seating available if you just want to enjoy your food. Nice meal after a travel day.

Name: Wok on Fire
Review Text: The food was very delicious, nice prices! I like

Name: Wok on Fire
Review Text: A very mordern restaurant, with nice decor, you can see the chef cook all of the meals from scratch which I really liked. The food is 100% fresh . The atmosphere was very welcoming & seemed very chilled. Last but not least THE FOOD TASTES AMAAAAZZING!! Would definitely go back on my next trip to Amsterdam.

Name: Wok on Fire
Review Text: I got a food poisson after eating the food. It was the only thing that I ate during the day and it caused huge issues in my stomach, making necessary to get a sick day from my job. In addition, I have called them and they were rude with the issue. Even telling me that I cannot put a complain to them, cause ¬®It is not possible¬®.

Name: Wok on Fire
Review Text:
The last two times we order, we are told that delivery is coming in 45 min and it actually comes after almost 2 hour.... Never again.
Food is quite good though. Truly a pity.

Name: Wok on Fire

Name: Wok on Fire
Review Text:

I call the restaurant and they told me that was not possible they did nothing. I will never ordered again from here specifically after reading other customers reviews.
